== NPP - ProServices - Senior Risk Management Specialist ==
=== Solicitation Information ===

*Solicitation Number*: G312025001

**Contracting Entity**: Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA)

**Description of Requirement**: The Canadian Transportation Agency (CTA) is seeking proposals from qualified Offerors for one (1) Senior Risk Management Specialist to provide expert commercial transportation third-party liability insurance advisory services.

**Supply Arrangement Holders Invited**: The following supply arrangement holders have been invited to submit proposals:

1. Accenture Inc.
2. Orbis Risk Consulting Inc.
3. Deloitte Inc.
4. Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
5. Ernst & Young LLP
6. Sigma Risk Management Inc
7. KPMG LLP
8. WSP Canada Inc.

**Contract Duration**: The contract will be for a period of nine (9) months, with an option for a one (1) year extension.

**Level of Security Clearance Required**: The selected contractor will require a Reliability level of security clearance.

**Evaluation Criteria**: Proposals will be evaluated based on their combined score, with a balance between technical merit and price.

**Tender Announcement and Download**: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39233/npp-en---fr\_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39233/npp-en---fr\_0.pdf)

**Contact Information**

Name: Mariah Sunohara
Email: mariah.sunohara@otc-cta.gc.ca
Phone: (000) 000-0000
